author: Justin Hawkins Rides Again
description:
🎟️ To see Justin Hawkins Rides Again LIVE across the UK, visit: 
https://www.aegpresents.co.uk/event/justin-hawkins-rides-again/

David Coverdale has announced his retirement. The man was an inspiration to me growing up in Suffolk and something else entirely to my mother. Anyway, to me, he is the Roger Moore of lead vocalists and a true Legend. This is a longer episode than usual, but there's lots to talk about including one of my favourite Whitesnake tracks, "Fool For Your Loving" - the original version from Ready an' Willing.

To come and see The Darkness on tour in the USA and Canada, you can find details here:  https://www.thedarknesslive.com/tour-dates/

To see more from JHRA,  join my Patreon here: http://www.patreon.com/jushawk

For Cameo messages: https://www.cameo.com/justinhawkins

Get a Justin Hawkins Rides Again T-Shirt & Hoodie here: https://thejawsofvictory

#reaction #davidcoverdale  #whitesnake
title: David Coverdale: "The Roger Moore of Lead Vocalists"
